widgets.title: Total DNS requests
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(pihole_dns_queries_today) as 'Total DNS requests'

widgets.title: Blocked DNS requests
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(pihole_ads_blocked_today) as 'Blocked DNS requests'

widgets.title: % blocked requests
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(pihole_ads_percentage_today) as '% blocked requests'

widgets.title: Domains on blocklist
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(pihole_domains_being_blocked) as 'Domains on blocklist'

widgets.title: DNS requests
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT ifthen( (earliest(pihole_dns_queries_today) - latest(pihole_dns_queries_today)) <= 0 , latest(pihole_dns_queries_today) - earliest(pihole_dns_queries_today) ) as 'DNS requests' timeseries

widgets.title: Requests blocked
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT ifthen( (earliest(pihole_ads_blocked_today) - latest(pihole_ads_blocked_today)) <= 0 , latest(pihole_ads_blocked_today) - earliest(pihole_ads_blocked_today) ) as 'Requests blocked' timeseries

widgets.title: Requests forwarded
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT ifthen( (earliest(pihole_queries_forwarded) - latest(pihole_queries_forwarded)) <= 0 , latest(pihole_queries_forwarded) - earliest(pihole_queries_forwarded) ) as 'Requests forwarded' timeseries

widgets.title: Requests cached
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT ifthen( (earliest(pihole_queries_cached) - latest(pihole_queries_cached)) <= 0 , latest(pihole_queries_cached) - earliest(pihole_queries_cached) ) as 'Requests cached' timeseries

widgets.title: Cumulative DNS requests
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(pihole_dns_queries_today) as 'Cumulative DNS requests' TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Cumulative requests blocked
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(pihole_ads_blocked_today) as 'Cumulative requests blocked' TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Cumulative requests forwarded
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(pihole_queries_forwarded) as 'Cumulative requests forwarded' TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Cumulative requests cached
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(pihole_queries_cached) as 'Cumulative requests cached' TIMESERIES
